summary.span: 使用 物件的 或 存取子，提供該物件的屬性值存取。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanSelectMultiple As Boolean
public: property bool CanSelectMultiple { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指定容器是否允許同時選取多個子項目。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the container allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

value.span: 如果控制項支援多重選取，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control supports multiple selection; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是動態，比方說，在少數情況下，控制項可能會允許選取初始化，但後續只允許單一選取来進行的多個項目。This property can be dynamic For example, in rare cases, a control might allow multiple items to be selected on initialization, but subsequently allow only single selections to be made. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來擷取屬性值。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to retrieve property values. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取選取容器中所有選取的項目。

span.span: Retrieves all items in the selection container that are selected.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，集合會取得代表選取範圍容器中選取的項目。In the following example, a collection of s representing the selected items in a selection container is obtained. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#1025](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#1025)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#1025](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#1025)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelectionRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelectionRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定容器是否需要至少選取一個子項目。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the container requires at least one child item to be selected.

value.span: 如果控制項要求至少要選取一個項目，則此值為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control requires at least one item to be selected; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以是動態的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，控制項的最初狀態可能預設沒有選取任何項目，表示 為 `false`。For example, the initial state of a control might not have any items selected by default, indicating that is `false`. 不過，在選取項目之後，控制項就必須至少有一個項目一律保持為選取。However, after an item is selected, the control must always have at least one item selected. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自隨後使用它來擷取屬性值。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to retrieve property values. [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
